alert.note: Alert for Northern Harrison; Southern Harrison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 3:02PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Harrison County through 330 PM CDT... At 301 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Long Beach, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Biloxi, Long Beach, St. Martin, D`iberville, Lyman and Gulfport Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 26 and 41, and near mile marker 44. Interstate 110 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 3. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
